
---
title: '6599 元起，华为新款 MateBook 14s 发布：12 代酷睿标压 + 2.5K 90Hz 屏'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/57bd7a10-8291-4d0f-a60d-a349f4f047a1.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Wed, 27 Jul 2022 13:33:47 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/57bd7a10-8291-4d0f-a60d-a349f4f047a1.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="2986"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 7 月 27 日消息，今晚，华为发布了新款 MateBook 14s 笔记本，搭载 12 代酷睿标压，配备 2.5K 90Hz 屏，售价 6599 元起。</p><ul class=" list-paddingleft-2"><li><p data-vmark="b9b2">i5-12500H + 16GB + 512GB ：6599 元</p></li><li><p data-vmark="14eb">i5-12500H + 16GB + 1TB ：6799 元</p></li><li><p data-vmark="521d">i7-12700H + 16GB +  1TB ：7999 元</p></li></ul><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="a217"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/57bd7a10-8291-4d0f-a60d-a349f4f047a1.png" w="1118" h="926" title="6599 元起，华为新款 MateBook 14s 发布：12 代酷睿标压 + 2.5K 90Hz 屏" width="1118" height="679" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p style="text-align: center;" data-vmark="40c1"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/7/1931ce90-ba3a-4110-8977-ec05fba4c86f.png" w="938" h="682" title="6599 元起，华为新款 MateBook 14s 发布：12 代酷睿标压 + 2.5K 90Hz 屏" width="938" height="596" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="a68d">IT之家了解到，新款 MateBook 14s 可选深空灰、皓月银和云杉绿三款配色，金属机身设计，轻约 1.43kg。</p><p data-vmark="cb0a">屏幕方面，新款 MateBook 14s 搭载了<strong> 14.2 英寸 2.5K 3:2 屏，90Hz 刷新率</strong>，400 尼特亮度，100% sRGB 色域，支持 10 点触控。</p><p data-vmark="3309">配置方面，<strong>新款 MateBook 14s 搭载了 12 代酷睿标压处理器，45W 性能释放</strong>，配备 16GB LPDDR4X 内存，可选 512GB / 1TB SSD。</p><p data-vmark="3674">其他方面，新款 MateBook 14s 搭载了四扬声器音响系统，内置 60Wh 电池，配备 90W GaN 充电器。接口包括雷电 4、HDMI、USB-A 等。软件方面，新款 MateBook 14s 支持超级终端，可与手机、平板、显示器、智慧屏等设备协同。</p><dir><a contenteditable="false" href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-hosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380" data-jdid="100029902383"><span class="card main-site"><span class="card-logo"><img src="https://img14.360buyimg.com/pop/jfs/t1/80477/6/21183/112823/62e120b8E366495d3/9e5cdf5068b6e0f7.jpg" title="6599 元起，华为新款 MateBook 14s 发布：12 代酷睿标压 + 2.5K 90Hz 屏" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></span><span class="card-info"><span class="card-title"><span class="mall-data">京东</span><span class="card-name">华为笔记本电脑 MateBook 14s 2022 </span></span><span class="card-abstract"></span><span class="card-controls"><span class="price">7999 元</span><span class="card-btn-deep">直达链接</span></span></span></span></a></dir>
          
</div>
